overview:
Miles is a new player to the world of business and entrepreneurship. He currently is cultivating some ideas for new websites and web based companies.

Since the age of seven Miles Jacobsen has been attending motivational seminars and been around companies such as MonaVie, ViaViente, New Vision, Pre-Paid Legal and most recently Regeneca, Inc. During his time around the aforementioned network marketing companies Miles has learned what works and what doesn’t. It doesn’t matter if your company produces the greatest product in the world. If your employees and internal works are not functioning like a well oiled machine you’re doomed.

This being said Miles is looking to create a niche in the business world for a fun, transparent, welcoming company. Without disclosing his ideas, Miles plans to create a company that values employees their ideas and their well being over making seven figures or buying a new sport car. He would rather drive a Ford and have a happy hardworking team of employees developing an amazing product. Than drive a new sports car and have employees that dread clocking in for work.
